mapper.insert:
SELECT get_sequences('c_customer_flowinfo') AS id FROM dual
insert into c_customer_flowinfo(id,storeIdUuid,storeCode,name,realTime,indoorCount,outdoorCount, statDimensionDayTime,statDimensionHourTime,outsum, areaCode,areaName,storeAreaIdUuid,syCount,multiInfo) values(#{id}, #{storeIdUuid, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeCode, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realTime, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indoorCount, javaType=Long, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{outdoorCount, javaType=Long, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statDimensionDayTime, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statDimensionHourTime, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outsum, javaType=Long, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{areaCode, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaName, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeAreaIdUuid, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syCount, javaType=Long, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{multiInfo,javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
